byline.contributor: Jason Grant reported from Mount Holly, and Benjamin Weiser from New York.
byline.original: By JASON GRANT and BENJAMIN WEISER

abstract: Judge Michael J Hogan of New Jersey Superior Court hears arguments by environmental groups as well as lawyers for state and Exxon Mobil Corporation in challenge to proposed settlement in ongoing legal battle over environmental pollution at refinery sites.
lead_paragraph: On Thursday, lawyers for New Jersey and environmental groups argued their case about an environmental contamination settlement between the state and Exxon.

headline.main: Judge Hears Arguments on an Exxon Settlement
headline.print_headline: Judge Hears Arguments About Deal With Exxon

snippet: On Thursday, lawyers for New Jersey and environmental groups argued their case about an environmental contamination settlement between the state and Exxon.
